Summary: Shiny oval, shield like object playing with midway airport planes coming in for landing

divs: sighting detailsthis report comes in sections over about a 45 minute time period. the objects would appear and disapear throughout this time . skies were clear and it was very nice out. midway planes flying low coming in for landings to airport from my point of view west from backyard patio. i was outside on patio talking on the phone for several minutes. i looked towards the west and saw an airplane flying low. in front of the airplane was a large, shiny oval object standing up in front of it, it looked almost like a sheild. as the airplane neared the object it disappeared right in front of it. after the plane went by the shiny oval reappered. this object was due west. this object hovered in the general same spot appearing and disappearing for about 5 minutes. about 5 minutes later, i saw this same object now more northwest just were the planes turn. the object did the same as above. several minutes later, i saw this same object as described above now in the southwest cornor and had gained a slightly higher altitude. yet still low. the planes were flying underneath it now. this object was a shiny silver to a pure white color. no body, faa lights, noise, wings, windows, markings or typical commerical or helicopter type of aerodynamic movement. then this object seemed to disappear into thin air. a few minutes went by and i noticed what looked like a black orb coming out of a strange cloud formation that just appeared out of nowhere in the west. i kept watching and thought maybe it was a helicopter but i did not see the usual lights or hear any noise. this was not a bird. this object sat low and then moved. it had no wings or bird like movements. then another commerical airplane came in and this black orb object moved from this cloud formation and flew around this plane coming in. this object looked like it was dancing with the plane and the movements were slow and fluid. this object then went back down to where the cloud was and just vanished as did the cloud formation. a couple of minutes went by and i noticed what i thought was a bright planet or a star. it was probably 100\200 feet from the neighbors roof heading due east. i thought maybe a plane but they usaully dont fly that low over the homes. i wathced as this sometimes white to pink light neared. but it stopped and then vanished. then it appeared again only to get closer and bigger. this happened 2 more times and and it looked metal on the bottom with appendages. it was right over the roof top and just blinked out. i probably could touch it if i was on the roof. it was that low.
